org.accada.epcis.queryclient
Class QueryControlClient

java.lang.Object
  org.accada.epcis.queryclient.QueryControlClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
QueryControlInterface
public class QueryControlClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements QueryControlInterface

This query client is a wrapper for EPCISServiceBindingStub which performs the calls to the Query Operations Module. Additionally this client provides some convenience methods for polling and subscribing queries given in XML form.

Author:
Marco Steybe

poll

public org.accada.epcis.soapapi.QueryResults poll(java.lang.String queryName,
                                                  org.accada.epcis.soapapi.QueryParam[] params)
                                           throws javax.xml.rpc.ServiceException,
                                                  java.rmi.RemoteException
Performs a poll operation at the repository's Query Controls Module, i.e. runs a query with the given name and parameters.

Specified by:
poll in interface QueryControlInterface
Parameters:
queryName - The name of the query to be executed.
params - The parameters of the query to be executed.
Returns:
The QueryResults.

java.rmi.RemoteException - If an exception communicating with the repository's Query Controls Module occured.
See Also:
QueryControlInterface.poll(java.lang.String, org.accada.epcis.soapapi.QueryParam[])

pollDirect

public java.lang.String pollDirect(java.lang.String query)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Wraps the query given in its XML representation into a SOAP message and sends it directly to the repository's Query Operations Module using HTTP POST. The query results will be unwrapped from the SOAP response message.

Parameters:
query - The query in its XML form (will be wrapped into a SOAP request message).
Returns:
The query results in its XML form (unwrapped from a SOAP response message).
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If an error on the transport layer (HTTP) occured.

poll

public org.accada.epcis.soapapi.QueryResults poll(java.lang.String query)
                                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                  javax.xml.rpc.ServiceException
Parses the query given in its XML representation and sends it to the Query Operations Module. Same operation as the method with the InputStream argument.

Parameters:
query - The query in its XML form.
Returns:
The QueryResults as it is returned from the repository's Query Operations Module.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - If an error communicating with the Query Operations Module occured.
javax.xml.rpc.ServiceException - If an error within the Query Operations Module occured.

subscribe

public void subscribe(java.lang.String queryName,
                      org.accada.epcis.soapapi.QueryParam[] params,
                      org.apache.axis.types.URI dest,
                      org.accada.epcis.soapapi.SubscriptionControls controls,
                      java.lang.String subscriptionId)
               throws javax.xml.rpc.ServiceException,
                      java.rmi.RemoteException
Performs a subscribe operation at the repository's Query Controls Module, i.e. subscribes a query for later execution.

Specified by:
subscribe in interface QueryControlInterface
Parameters:
queryName - The name of the query to be executed.
params - The parameters of the query to be executed.
dest - The destination address where QueryResults will be sent once the subscribed query gets executed.
controls - The SubscriptionControls.
subscriptionId - The ID of the subscription.
Throws:
javax.xml.rpc.ServiceException - If an exception whithin the repository's Query Controls Module occured.
java.rmi.RemoteException - If an exception communicating with the repository's Query Controls Module occured.
See Also:
QueryControlInterface.subscribe(java.lang.String, org.accada.epcis.soapapi.QueryParam[], org.apache.axis.types.URI, org.accada.epcis.soapapi.SubscriptionControls, java.lang.String)
